Plot: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.
Title: The Princess and the Frog
Writer: Ron Clements (story by), John Musker (story by), Greg Erb (story by), Jason Oremland (story by), Ron Clements (screenplay), John Musker (screenplay), Rob Edwards (screenplay), E.D. Baker (story inspired in part by "The Frog Princess" by)
Actors: Anika Noni Rose, Bruno Campos, Keith David, Michael-Leon Wooley
tomatoConsensus: The warmth of traditional Disney animation makes this occasionally lightweight fairy-tale update a lively and captivating confection for the holidays.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 37 nominations.
